name: Overview
content:
L1-Systems supply cutting-edge communication solutions and services that completely fit all of your needs.

Some of our communications include:
  • The alert measurement systems.
  • Cryptography.
  • Radio systems.
  • Network-centric warfare.

name: Infrastructure
content:
L1-Systems provide communcations infrastructure for wide variety of needs, scaling from business level and up to nation level.

We have proven expertise in IP-based and radio networks, while also maintaining high built-in cryptographic algorithms and electronic jamming counter measures.
  • IP-based LAN / WAN
  • Telephony Networks
  • Radio Networks
  • Electronic Anti-Jamming
  • Cryptographic Algorithms

name: Satallite Communication
content:
L1-Systems provide the best Satallite Communication solutions avialable in the market. With cutting-edge technology and up to fourth generation commercial broadband services for either the public sector or government organizations.

  • 4G Satallite Communication
  • High Quality broadband IP access
  • Cellular network access
  • Satallite Communication on the move
